articles.title: ‘One Battle After Another’ and ‘Hamnet’ take top honors at Golden Globes
articles.description: Paul Thomas Anderson’s ragtag revolutionary saga “One Battle After Another” took top honors at Sunday’s 83rd Golden Globes in the comedy category, while Chloé Zhao’s Shakespeare drama “Hamnet” pulled off an upset over “Sinners” to win best film, drama. “One Battle After Another”&#160

articles.title: Why music brings no joy to some people
articles.description: A small group of people experience no pleasure from music despite normal hearing and intact emotions. Brain imaging reveals that their auditory and reward systems fail to properly communicate, leaving music emotionally flat. Researchers developed a questionnaire to measure how rewarding music feels

articles.title: Nikki Glaser takes swings at CBS and Leonardo DiCaprio in Golden Globes monologue
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Nikki Glaser went hard then eased up in her monologue to open Sunday’s Golden Globes. articles.title: Protesters try to attack driver after truck speeds through anti-Iran demonstration in Los Angeles
